amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for NNSA Office of the Administrator by $21,899,000 and increase funds for the Defense Environmental Cleanup Act (specifically NNSA labs) by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for Defense Nuclear Nonproliferation Office of the Administrator by $21,899,000 and increase funds for Environmental and Other Defense Activities Defense Environmental Cleanup by $21,899,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lujan amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 244 (Roll no. 333).
